entry.title: Luxury Boxed New Baby Card 'Welcome Baby Girl'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: New Baby Cards
Price: 14.95

This gorgeous luxury boxed handmade card will be just perfect to celebrate the birth of a new baby girl.

The cover of the design features the word BABY printed on pink and white paper square panels and beautifully adorned with pink and crystal clear real crystals, pink silk mini flower, pink satin ribbon, pink round button with white polka dots and die cut white baby paper feet.

This New Baby card is beautifully presented in luxury brown box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed New Baby Card 'Welcome Baby Boy'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: New Baby Cards
Price: 14.95

A lovely luxury boxed new baby boy card which would make an amazing gift for the new happy parents.

The design features the word BABY printed in capital letters on blue and white paper squares and gorgeously handcrafted with blue and crystal clear real crystals, blue silk mini flower, blue satin ribbon, blue round button with white polka dots and die cut white tiny paper feet.

This New Baby card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed New Baby Card 'Pink Elephant'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: New Baby Cards
Price: 17.50

Congratulate new parents or grandparents on arrival beautiful baby girl with this lovely pink elephant baby card. The card comes in our special luxury gift box and can be personalised with own personal message both on front and inside.

The design features print of pink elephant holding floating pink balloons and gorgeously handcrafted with ribbon roses, crystals, pink pom poms and heart shaped buttons.

This new baby girl card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed New Baby Card 'It's a Girl'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: New Baby Cards
Price: 15.95

This classy new baby card will be just perfect to congratulate your family or friends on arrival of their precious new baby girl.

A beautiful luxury boxed Baby Girl card featuring pink satin ribbon bow mounted to pink and silver background and gorgeously decorated with crystals and tiny pink baby feet.

This New Baby card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed New Baby Card 'It's a Boy'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: New Baby Cards
Price: 15.95

This stylish new baby card will be just ideal to send your congratulations and best wishes on arrival of a special new baby bay to a new parents.

The design boasts blue satin ribbon bow placed on blue and silver square background and beautifully handcrafted with real crystals and tiny blue baby feet.

This New Baby card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed New Baby Card 'Double Joy - Boy and Girl'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: New Baby Cards
Price: 14.95

A gorgeous personalised luxury card to celebrate the arrival of a truly double joy - baby boy and baby girl.

The card features the word BABY printed in capital letters on white, blue and pink paper square panels and beautifully hand-crafted with crystals, ivory silk mini flower, cream satin ribbon, pink and blue buttons and two pairs of die cut pink and blue tiny baby feet.

This New Baby card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed New Baby Card 'Wow! It's Twin Girls'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: New Baby Cards
Price: 14.95

An exceptional individually boxed new baby card to celebrate the birth of two very special new baby girls. It will make a perfect keepsake and will be cherished for many years.

The front of the design boasts the word BABY printed on white and pink paper squares and hand-decorated with real crystals, pink silk mini flower, pink satin ribbon, two pink buttons with white polka dots and two pairs of die cut white tiny baby feet.

This New Baby card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: New Baby Cards
Price: 14.95

A special luxury new baby card to celebrate the birth of two very special new baby boys. It will make a great keepsake and will be treasured for many years to come.

The front of the design boasts the word BABY printed on white and blue paper squares and gorgeously hand-finished with crystals, blue silk mini flower, blue satin ribbon, two blue buttons with white polka dots and two pairs of die cut white tiny baby feet.

This New Baby card is beautifully presented in luxury brown box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.
